Hello I'm learning with this tutorial, I have problema with the database, I have copied the file MvcMusicStore.sdf under the folder App_Data.

I have copied the connection String into the web.config

when I run the apliccation I get the error:

No Entity Framework provider for ADO.NET provider met the invariable name 'System.Data.SqlServerCe.4.0'

Any idea?

Thanks
